title: One pan Mediterranean roast chicken, potatoes and peppers
ingredients: ['750g Maris Piper potatoes, peeled and quartered', '8 chicken thighs, skinless and boneless', '150g diced chorizo or bacon lardons', '1 to 2 red, yellow or orange peppers, seeded and cut into wedges', '1 large red onion, cut into 8 wedges', '3 carrots, cut into chunks', '2 sprigs rosemary', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', 'juice of 1 lemon', '20 cherry or baby plum tomatoes', '1 large handful of green olives, plain or stuffed with pimento or anchovies (optional)']
